needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: To make pizzas, you can't use traditional methods. Instead, you need to have a machine that can recognize patterns and respond accordingly. That's why pizza makers in New York used to have a stove in their homes, not just the ordinary gas stoves used in their offices.
